Category Cloud

25 January 2006

Update: The CategoryCloud plugin has been renamed to CloudNine. Please go to the CloudNine project blog for any and all updates, documentation and downloads.

There are also several posts around this blog that have been tagged cloudnine that may contain usefull information, but the CloudNine project page is where you really want to go.

CategoryCloud is a plugin for MovableType that allows users to generate weighed clouds based on the number of posts a category has.

Download 1.0

To use this just download and extract into the plugins directory and adjust your templates:

<MTCatCloud> <!-- <$MTCatCloudWeight$> --> <a href="http://example.com/blog/category/<$MTCatCloudName$>" style="<$MTCatCloudCSS$>"><$MTCatCloudName$></a> </MTCatCloud>
